title: AI Engineer
description:
Machine Learning and Data Science, helping them develop practical skills and real-world project experience to kickstart a successful career in AI and analytics.
Role Overview
As an AI Engineer Intern, you will work on live AI projects involving data preprocessing, model training, and deployment.
Responsibilities
✅ Build and optimize ML models
✅ Work with structured and unstructured datasets
✅ Implement deep learning pipelines
Tools
TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn
Requirements
Strong fundamentals in ML and Python

title: AI Engineer

title: AI Engineer
description:
